item.title: Colby add a quote by Jerry Spinelli
item.description: "The earth is speaking to us, but we can't hear because of all the racket our senses are making. Sometimes we need to erase them, erase our senses. Then - maybe - the earth will touch us. The universe will speak. The stars will whisper." -- Jerry Spinelli

item.title: Colby add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Nothing can dim the light which shines from within." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Colby add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Colby add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Look well into thyself; there is a source of strength which will always spring up if thou wilt always look." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Colby add a quote by Brene Brown
item.description: "You are imperfect, you are wired for struggle, but you are worthy of love and belonging." -- Brene Brown

item.title: Colby add a quote by Brené Brown
item.description: "Vulnerability is our most accurate measurement of courage." -- Brené Brown

item.title: Colby add a quote by Brene Brown
item.description: "Owning our story can be hard but not nearly as difficult as spending our lives running from it. Embracing our vulnerabilities is risky but not nearly as dangerous as giving up on love and belonging and joy—the experiences that make us the most vulnerable. Only when we are brave enough to explore the darkness will we discover the infinite power of our light." -- Brene Brown

item.title: Colby add a quote by Caroline Pratt
item.description: "Childhood’s work is learning, and it is in his play...that the child works at his job." -- Caroline Pratt

item.title: Colby add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Colby add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I want To do with you what spring does with the cherry trees." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Colby add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "To feel the love of people whom we love is a fire that feeds our life." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Colby add a quote by Derek Walcott
item.description: "The time will come when, with elation, you will greet yourself arriving at your own door, in your own mirror, and each will smile at the other’s welcome." -- Derek Walcott
